webcrawler

Class Crawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • webcrawler.Crawler

  • public class Crawler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the core logic of the crawler. It loads templates from Excel, crawls the given web sites, and saves the results.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Crawler(java.sql.Connection conn, java.util.List<java.io.File> excelSheets)
      Create a new Crawler object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void crawl()
      This method executes the web crawl.
      void list(java.sql.Connection conn)
      This method lists all items that currently exist in the database.
      void save(java.sql.Connection conn)
      This method saves all items contained in this crawler to the database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Crawler

        public Crawler(java.sql.Connection conn,
       java.util.List<java.io.File> excelSheets)
        Create a new Crawler object.
        Parameters:
        conn - The database connection that this crawler will use
        excelSheets - a list of excel files containing SiteFormat information

    • Method Detail

      • crawl

        public void crawl()
        This method executes the web crawl. It retrieves the HTML for each siteFormat and parses the items from the HTML

      • save

        public void save(java.sql.Connection conn)
        This method saves all items contained in this crawler to the database.
        Parameters:
        conn - The database connection to be used.

      • list

        public void list(java.sql.Connection conn)
        This method lists all items that currently exist in the database.
        Parameters:
        conn -
